Alcoholics Anonymous

Savannah, Georgia | (912) 356-3688 (24 hours a day)

Savannah AA Meetings

Download Print Schedule »

Meeting Codes

  • C = Closed Meeting (alcoholics only)
  • O = Open Meeting (all welcome)
  • G = LGBT
  • YP = Young People (all welcome)
  • BB = Big Book Study
  • BK = Book Study
  • S = Speaker Meeting
  • SS = Step Study
  • W = Women's Meeting
  • M = Men's Meeting
  • BG = Beginner's Meeting
  • SP = Spanish Speaking
  • P = Prayer
Did You Know? Meetings can be custom sorted by clicking the table header. For example, try clicking or tapping on "City/Location."
On mobile, touch Day Name to Collapse & Select Another Day, swipe to scroll table.
